Review Name: Fabulous! Review Description: Installed in room with a lot of stuff and around 240 sq foot carpet area. In summers outside temp is constantly above 45, a lot of humidity also there. But inside room become peradise in just 5 mins after starting AC. It is just amazing. No words to Praise. Just go for it. Second bluestar in family it has amazed again Flipkart installation person called me twice back to back after delivery and as I was busy that time so not picked his call. After 15 mins I got message of cancellation of installation. But I have not requested same. So have to install it myself. I know how to do it so I have done it as I had all tools available with me. It could be a blunder for others
